healing_herbs.name: Healing Herbs
healing_herbs.description: A collection of medicinal plants that can restore minor wounds.

health_potion.name: Health Potion
health_potion.description: A red liquid that restores health when consumed.

mana_potion.name: Mana Potion
mana_potion.description: A blue liquid that restores magical energy.

rations.name: Travel Rations
rations.description: Dried meat and hardtack that can sustain you for a day.

scroll_fireball.name: Scroll of Fireball
scroll_fireball.description: A magical scroll containing the fireball spell.

superior_healing_potion.name: Superior Healing Potion
superior_healing_potion.description: A potent healing potion that restores significant health.

mana_crystal.name: Mana Crystal
mana_crystal.description: A crystallized form of magical energy that restores mana.

travel_rations.name: Travel Rations
travel_rations.description: Preserved food that can sustain you during long journeys.

bread.name: Bread
bread.description: A loaf of freshly baked bread.

strength_elixir.name: Elixir of Strength
strength_elixir.description: A red potion that temporarily increases your physical power.

wisdom_brew.name: Wisdom Brew
wisdom_brew.description: A golden tea that sharpens the mind and enhances perception.

dexterity_draught.name: Draught of Agility
dexterity_draught.description: A clear liquid that makes your movements swift and precise.

greater_health_potion.name: Greater Health Potion
greater_health_potion.description: A powerful healing draught that restores significant health.

superior_mana_potion.name: Superior Mana Potion
superior_mana_potion.description: An azure liquid that restores significant magical energy.
